Eazzy bụ aha ọkachamara nke Mildred Ashong (amụrụ n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1986), onye Ghana na-agụ egwu, onye na-eti egwu rap, na onye na-ede egwu.
Mildred Ashong gụrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ St Anthony's Junior na ụlọ akwụkwọ JSS, Mfantsiman Secondary, Institute of languages, University of Professional Studies, na Chartered Institute of Marketing UK
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Birmingham, England na Postgraduate na chartered marketing UK na Symphony Hall n'onwa Nọvemba afọ 2008.
Mgbe otu afọ gasịrị ka ọ bachara ụlọ ọrụ egwu, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya Twinkle n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010
Ndị egwu atọ kwadoro ya: "Bo Wonsem Ma Me", "Wengeze" na "One Gal"
Egwu ndị a mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta abụọ na  4Syte Music Video Awards nke afọ 2010, yana nhọpụta ise na 2011 Ghana Music Awards.
Nrukọrịta ọrụ ya na Richie na egwu "One Gal" mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite nke Best Story Line Video of the Year n'afọ 2011 nke 4Syte Music Video Awards
N'afọ 2012, Eazzy na Lynx Entertainment kagburu nkwekọrịta azụmahịa ha ma nwee kwekọrọ nkewaa ụzọ
Ọ bịanyere aka na UK Africori Distribution n'afọ 2014.
O wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya Against All Odds na iTunes n'afọ 2014
Ọ na-egosi njirimara otu egwu "Go Go Wind", "Scream" na "Bad to da Bone", nke ikpeazụ n'ime ha nwere njirimara olu sitere na nke Edem
Ọ kwadoro Ghana Music Awards na 2014 na 2015
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka The Next Big Thing, usoro talent hip hop
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na agba nke anọ,ise, asatọ na asaa  nke MTN Hitmaker
O weputara "Kpakposhito", "Nana" nke gosipụtara Stonebwoy, "Forever" nke gosipụtara Mr Eazi, "Power" nke gosipụtara Shatta Wale, yana egwu Hiplife / Afrobeats akpọra"Obaa Gbemi".
